recipes.title: Spicy sweet chilli vegetable noodles
steps: Drain and press the tofu.
Heat a tbsp of oil in the wok on medium heat.
Cook the pressed tofu until golden brown then remove from the wok.
Add garlic and ginger, let cook for about a minute.
Add carrots and saute. Then add green peppers, red peppers, onion, courgette, pak choi one at a time.
In a bowl whisk together the sweet chilli, soy sauce, sriracha, water and peanut butter.
Cook the noodles according to packet directions
Add the tofu, noodles and sauce into the vegetables and mix well.

recipes.title: Roasted tomato and basil pasta
steps: Preheat the oven to 200° C and get a baking tray ready.
Halve the tomatoes and arrange them on the prepared baking tray, cut side up. Sprinkle with olive oil, dried basil, salt and pepper. Bake,.
Heat up the wok on low-medium heat. Once hot, add the pine nuts and dry-roast them until golden. Remove from wok.
Cook the pasta al dente following the packet instructions.
Add garlic to the wok, let cook for about a minute.
Add green peppers to the wok and let cook. When slightly soft add the red peppers.
Add the canned tomatoes, spices, herbs and shredded basil leaves. Simmer for ten minutes.
Add the spinach to the wok and mix in.
Turn off heat and add the pasta and baby tomatoes to the sauce.
Serve topped with pine nuts, basil and mozarella

recipes.title: Spicy scalloped potatoes and cauliflower
steps: Preheat the oven to 200° C
Mix together spices to form spice blend.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion then garlic and cook until translucent.
Add flour and spice blend, cook for a minute. Add lime juice and cook for a few seconds.
Add milk and cheese and mix well. Continue to cook until the mixture thickens.
Layer the cauliflower then potatoes in a lined baking dish.
Spread the sauce over the potatoes and cauliflower.
Bake covered at 400 deg F / 200ºc for 20 minutes.
Cook sausages
Uncover and bake another 15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.

recipes.title: Breakfast Burritos
steps: Heat the oven to 200° C and put in hash browns and nuggies.
Cut halloumi into slices and add to oven slightly later.
Finely chop red onion, garlic, avocado, tomatoes and coriander and mix together for salsa.
Add cumin and squuze lime juice over salsa.
Whisk eggs together and cook for scrambled eggs.
Mix tofu and cumin to make tofu scramble.
Assemble burritos by adding a mixture of the salsa, eggs or tofu and halloumi or nuggies.

recipes.title: Vegetable lasagna
steps: Heat the oven to 200° C and line a baking dish.
In the frying pan cook garlic then add tinned tomatoes, herbs and spices.
Cook eggplant, add to a bowl. Then mushrooms. Then bell peppers.
Cook spinach, when done add ricotta and cheese.
Spoon half of the vegetables into the baking dish followed by half the tomato sauce and lasagna sheets.
Repeat the above step.
Cover the top with spinach and ricotta mixture then bake for 20mins covered and 10 mins uncovered.

recipes.title: Tomato, sausage and spinach risotto
steps: In a pot, bring the tomatoes and the broth to a light simmer.
Heat the oil in the wok over medium-high. Add the sausage and break into pieces.
Add the garlic to the wok.
Add the rice and toss to coat. Toast 1 minute.
Add the wine and simmer until most of it evaporates, 1 minute.
Pour the tomato stock into the skillet, one ladle at a time. Stirring continuously.
Remove from heat and toss in the butter and cheese.
Add the spinach and toss until wilted.

recipes.title: Curried sausage
steps: In a frying pan cook the sausages until browned all over. Transfer to plate.
In the wok add onion, carrot and garlic. Once slightly cooked add bell peppers.
Meanwhile start cooking the rice.
When vegetables are softened add the curry powder and cumin. Stir to coat for a minute.
Add fruit chutney and stock. Return sausages to pan.
Cover, bring to the boil then simmer for 10 minutes.
If sauce is not thickening add a cornstrarch slurry.
Stir in peas and cook for several minutes.

recipes.title: Japanese curry
steps: Drain and press the tofu
Heat the wok and add some oil. Once hot add the onion and cook till softened.
Add the garic and potatoes.
In another pan fry the pressed tofu slices until golden brown.
In the wok when the potatoes have softened add the carrot.
Start cooking the rice
Once carrots are tender cover mixture in boiling water. Add the courgette and simmer until vegetables are cooked.
Turn off the heat, add the tofu and break in the golden curry block
Stir until block is completely dissolved, simmer a few more minutes.

recipes.title: Cajun tofu with coriander lime rice
steps: Drain and press the tofu
Mix the spices (only use half the cumin) with 1 tbsp of the lime juice and some olive oil to make a paste.
Rub the paste mix on the tofu and sit for 15 mins.
Bake the tofu in the oven for 20 - 30 mins at 180° C.
Cook the rice.
Finely chop red onion, garlic, avocado, tomatoes and half the coriander and mix together for salsa.
Add cumin and squeeze one tbsp of lime juice over salsa.
Mix the remaining chopped coriander and lime juice into the rice.

recipes.title: Cheddar and green chile waffles
steps: Finely chop and cook the chillies, set aside.
In a large bowl whisk together flour, cornmeal, baking powder, 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon salt, and cayenne pepper.
Add milk, remaining 2/3 cup olive oil, and eggs, and maple syrup, whisking to combine.
Fold in the cheddar cheese and chiles.
Spray waffle iron with cooking spray. Pour batter into waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
Eat half of the waffles while cooking because Jess said so.

recipes.title: Devilled sausages
steps: Preheat oven to 180° C
Pan fry sausages until cooked.
Fry onion, apple and garlic in the pan until soft.
Cut sausages into pieces.
In a baking tin mix the sausages, onion, apple and garlic.
Mix together remaining ingredients and pour over sausages.
Bake in the oven for 20 mins.
Cook rice.

recipes.title: Nachos
steps: In the wok cook the onion. Add in this order: garlic, carrot, green pepper, red pepper, courgette, mince, beans.
Add whatever spices tickle your pickle, unless it's five tbsp of chilli powder.
Add the tinned tomatoes and simmer.
Arrange corn chips on plates and pour mixture over.
Top with chopped avocado.

recipes.title: French toast
steps: Whisk together eggs, milk, salt, sugar, vanilla, and cinnamon in a shallow and flat dish.
Place bread slices, one or two at a time, into the egg mixture and flip to make sure both sides of bread are well-coated.
Melt butter in a the frying pan.
Place bread slices in frying pan and cook until golden brown on each side.
Top with berries, banana, maple syrup or whatever toppings you have.

recipes.title: Vegan curry laksa
steps: Drain and press the tofu.
Toast the coriander and cumin seeds until fragrant. Add to a blender and blend to a coarse mixture.
Add the tumeric, ginger, chile, cayenne, lemongrass, garlic, cashews, coriander and lime juice and blend until a paste.
Cook the pressed and sliced tofu until golden brown, remove from the pan.
In the frying pan on medium heat add the curry paste and cool for 2 minutes.
Add the carrot, green pepper, red pepper, mushroom, courgette and pak choi stems. Pausing between each one to cook them.
Add the broth, tofu and coconut milk and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and add noodles. Simmer until noodles are cooked.

recipes.title: Gratin
steps: Preheat oven to 180° C and line the casserole dish.
Peel potatoes and cut into 1/8-inch slices.
Melt butter over medium heat. Cook onion in butter, stirring occasionally, add garlic and cook until tender.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, until bubbly. Remove from heat.
Slowly stir in milk and 1 1/2 cups of the cheese. Heat to boiling, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute until the cheese is completely melted.
Spread potatoes in casserole dish. Pour cheese sauce over potatoes. Bake uncovered for 1 hour.
Mix remaining cheese and bread crumbs, sprinkle over potatoes. Bake uncovered 15 minutes or until top is brown and bubbly.

recipes.title: Pasta bake
steps: Preheat oven to 180° C and line the casserole dish.
In the wok cook the sausages and break into pieces. Add the garlic and chilli flakes.
Once garlic is cooked add the canned tomatoes and simmer.
Add the water and penne, simmer until pasta is cooked. Remove from heat.
Stir in the cream, ½ cup of the Parmesan, and 3 tablespoons of the basil.
Transfer to the casserole dish and sprinkle the mozzarella and remaining ¼ cup Parmesan on top.
Bake uncovered in the oven for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with remaning basil and fancy mozarella.

recipes.title: Gnocchi
steps: Preheat oven to 180° C and line the casserole dish.
In the wok cook the onion, once cooked add the garlic and chilli.
Add the green pepper then the red pepper until cooked.
Add the canned tomatoes and the herbs and spices, simmer for 10 minutes.
Cook the gnocchi as per packet instructions.
Stir the spinach and fresh basil into the wok, once cooked add the gnocchi and remove from heat.
Transfer to the casserole dish and sprinkle half the mozzarella on top.
Bake uncovered in the oven for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with basil and fancy mozarella.
